alert.note: Alert for Central Carbon County; Ferris, Seminoe, Shirley Mountains; North Snowy Range Foothills; Shirley Basin; Sierra Madre Range; Snowy Range; Southwest Carbon County; Upper North Platte River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 26 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT CENTRAL CARBON COUNTY... At 343 PM MDT...An area of heavy snow across western Carbon County is impacting portions of Interstate 80 and nearby roadways between Elk Mountain and Rawlins. Periods of heavy snowfall will persist through 445 PM MDT. HAZARD...Sudden bursts of heavy snowfall. SOURCE...Radar and Webcams. IMPACT...Dangerous travel conditions. Locations impacted include... Rawlins, Saratoga, Hanna, Sinclair, Medicine Bow, Elk Mountain, Seminoe Campground, Seminoe Dam, Jack Creek Campground and Teton Reservoir. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Expect rapid changes in weather and road conditions. Motorists are urged to use extreme caution if traveling through these areas!
